game_description: ☀️ Fly through space and smash objects in orbit to grow from an atomic to a galactic scale! 🖐️ Designed to be fully playable with hand tracking or controllers. 💯 Try to beat your personal best score in eight unique skill challenges. 🚀 Unlock a speedrun mode for each level as you progress through the campaign. 🎵 Enjoy an ambient soundtrack designed to help you enter a state of flow. 🥽 Supports 120 Hz mode on Quest 2. 💺 Choose your play style: standing, seated, or single-handed. 📏 Height and reach radius can be adjusted to support different body sizes and abilities. 🛌 Recenter your view to play at any angle -- even lying down!
review_1: The first part is weird it took me a few minutes to figure out how to get the world started because there wasn’t a tutorial so just watch out for that but overall a good game
